title: Cross compiling to 32-bit x86 macOS stable 1.15.1 causes compiler panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Tried to cross compile my project [rust-belt](https://github.com/johnthagen/rust-belt) to 32-bit x86. On rust-belt commit https://github.com/johnthagen/rust-belt/commit/55898ea27c9e4c8ec6c170f452c6f80df3fd8c39.

OSX 10.11.6.

```bash
rustup show
Default host: x86_64-apple-darwin

installed toolchains
--------------------

stable-x86_64-apple-darwin (default)
nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin

installed targets for active toolchain
--------------------------------------

i686-apple-darwin
x86_64-apple-darwin

active toolchain
----------------

stable-x86_64-apple-darwin (default)
rustc 1.15.1 (021bd294c 2017-02-08)
```
